message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $14,500. I believe it will bring you significant value.
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,800. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While I'm willing to negotiate, $12,800 is a bit too low for me.  Could you meet me halfway at $13,600?
I can meet you halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13,300. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
